title: Episode 280: The Intervention (Feat. Donnell Rawlings & Jivanta Roberts)
itunes:title: Episode 280: The Intervention (Feat. Donnell Rawlings & Jivanta Roberts)
description:
Comedian Donnell Rawlings and Actress/Producer/Co-Host Jivanta Roberts join the ladies of Lip Service this week for a Friendsgiving special. The real reason the ladies brought Donnell on the show was to give him a proper intervention regarding his trash d*ck. While Donnell doesn’t take kindly to the conversation initially, he begins to realize his flaws and has a real epiphany that just may change his life forever. Enjoy!

P.S. We are aware of, and apologize for Angela’s audio quality on this episode. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
